message: Bob, let's start with a reasonable offer. I propose I take $60 and you take $40. This gives us both something and avoids us potentially losing money due to inflation.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's meet closer to the middle. I propose a 45/55 split.
Bob, I understand you want to meet closer to the middle, but the value of the money decreases faster for me. My offer is still the most fair considering the inflation.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We both lose if we don't agree. A 50/50 split is the only fair option considering the time pressure and inflation.
